import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useLanguage } from '../components/Layout'; import { content } from '../lib/data'; import { Mail, Phone, MapPin, Send } from 'lucide-react'; const ContactPage: React.FC = () => { const { language, dir } = useLanguage(); const t = content[language].contact; return (

{t.title}

{t.subtitle}
{/* Contact Info */}

{language === 'ar' ? 'العنوان' : 'Address'}

{t.info.address}

{language === 'ar' ? 'الهاتف' : 'Phone'}

{t.info.phone}

{language === 'ar' ? 'البريد الإلكتروني' : 'Email'}

{t.info.email}

 {/* Contact Form */}
